text:
Hi everyone. I'm having an error uploading the crm-card to github, has anyone had something similar?
error name: Prototype Pollution in lodash#19
Hi! Where did you encounter that error? Could you possibly give a screenshot of the context?
Hey Heitor! Curious is this blocking you from merging a PR? If it is, I'm wondering if that's because the dependabot action failed.

Hey Heitor, let us know if this is still blocking you. We had folks on our end take a look and we shouldn't be requiring an old version of lodash on the HubSpot side. Curious if you're using it in your project. Theoretically you should be able to resolve this with an `npm update`, but it might also not be crucial to resolve at all.
Hi Marcos! It's not stopping me from merging
<@U3PKJ8EQL> When I upload the project to github, even with the updated cli, the pollution error appears.

Perfect, so Dependabot is just saying this library has a security vulnerability in it and that is's recommended to update it. You may or may not be using a part that is vulnerable. It basically says that any version that is below 4.6.2 has the vulnerability. If `npm update` doesn't work, you could always manually bump up to a newer version such as `4.6.2` in your `package.json`.

Im not totally familar with how dependabot, but if its not updating this message, and you still have the try again button showing (as seen in the image you attached), you could try clicking that, because it may be failing to rerun.
